title: Introducing TensorFlow Lite (Coding TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this episode of Coding TensorFlow, Laurence Moroney, Developer Advocate for TensorFlow at Google, introduces us to TensorFlow Lite and its functions. You'll learn all about the model structure for TensorFlow Lite, and the various tools that are available for you to get your models ready for mobile.
